introVotingDay: Die {{name}} findet am <0>{{date}}</0> statt.<1></1>Der WahlSwiper erscheint voraussichtlich am <0>{{playableDate}}</0>.
introTextFuture: {{name}} dê li roja  <0>{{date}}</0> be. {{total}} Partî beşdarin. <0>{{participating}} ji {{total}} Partiyan</0> bersivên xwe dan WahlSwiper.
introTextPast: {{name}} li roja  <0>{{date}}</0> bû. {{total}} Partî beşdar bûn. <0>{{participating}} ji {{total}} Partiyan</0> bersivên xwe dan WahlSwiper.
introTextAllFuture: {{name}} dê li roja  <0>{{date}}</0> be. {{total}} Partî beşdarin. <0>{{participating}} ji {{total}} Partiyan</0> bersivên xwe dan WahlSwiper.
introTextAllPast: {{name}} li roja  <0>{{date}}</0> bû. {{total}} Partî beşdar bûn. <0>{{participating}} ji {{total}} Partiyan</0> bersivên xwe dan WahlSwiper.
quit: Ma hûn bi rastî dixwazin dev jê berdin? Pêşkeftina we dê xilas bibe û hûn dikarin paşê berdewam bikin.
selectPartiesIntro: Ewan partiyan  hilbijêre yên tu dixwazî encamên xwe ligel yên wan berawird bikî. Destpêkê <0>hemû partî</0> yên<0>hilbijartîne</0>. Paşî li jêr klîk bike <1>»berdewam«</1> da ku bigehî encamê. Tu herdem dikarî hejmara partiyan biguhêrî.
privacyNote: By clicking »Start VoteSwiper« you accept our <0>privacy policy</0>.
donationText: <0>The VoteSwiper is a project made by <1>citizens for citizens</1>. Today we reach several million people with - and that does not only require a lot of time, which we are happy to invest, but also money: The hosting alone for larger elections quickly costs <1>several thousand euros</1>. We are therefore dependent on your support to be able to continue offering VoteSwiper for you in the future.</0><0>Every amount helps.</0>
skippedQuestionsText: Bi kêmanî pirsek bersiv bidin ku hûn encama xwe bibînin.
swiperStateDialogTitle: We berê dest bi vê VoteSwiper kiriye.
swiperStateDialogText: Ma hûn dixwazin berdewam bikin an ji nû ve dest pê bikin?
swiperStateDialogRestart: Ji nû ve dest pê bikin
